name: billsgate
description: An admin for your personnal bills

scripts.about: echo 'This is the Bills Gate's API'
scripts.about:dev: echo 'It's the hotreloader using in develop mode'
scripts.about:init: echo 'Init the db and the migration'
scripts.init: npx sequelize-cli db:create && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate
scripts.about:reset: echo 'Delete and recreate a new db
scripts.reset: npx sequelize-cli db:drop && npx sequelize-cli db:create && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate
scripts.about:demo: echo 'Put demo data in the db'

author: Sinoquet Tristan
